options.label: A
options.text: They cause a cell's contents to leak out

options.label: B
options.text: They regulate communication between cells

options.label: C
options.text: They anchor the membrane to the cell's interior scaffolding

options.label: D
options.text: They create channels for specific molecules to pass through

multiple-choice.question: What is the consequence of the absence of a cell membrane?

options.label: A
options.text: There would be no cells

options.label: B
options.text: There would be no bacteria

options.label: C
options.text: There would be no parasites

options.label: D
options.text: All of the above
